heading: HR00285
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE RECOGNITION OF ANDRES BONIFACIO AS THE FIRST PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES AND URGING THE PRESIDENT TO INSTITUTE THROUGH THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION AND COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION SIGNIFICANT MEASURES TO DISSEMINATE AND PROPAGATE THE TRUTH ABOUT SUCH FACT IN HISTORY BOOKS, ELEMENTARY, HIGH SCHOOL AND TERTIARY EDUCATION, AND OTHER RELATED MEDIUM OF INFORMATION
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.;
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2016-09-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00285
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE RECOGNITION OF ANDRES BONIFACIO AS THE FIRST PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES AND URGING THE PRESIDENT TO INSTITUTE THROUGH THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION AND COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION SIGNIFICANT MEASURES TO DISSEMINATE AND PROPAGATE THE TRUTH ABOUT SUCH FACT IN HISTORY BOOKS, ELEMENTARY, HIGH SCHOOL AND TERTIARY EDUCATION, AND OTHER RELATED MEDIUM OF INFORMATION
